snippet: The S.&P. 500 posts its biggest loss since April after a plane crashes near the Ukraine-Russia border.
abstract: Downing of passenger pane flying over Ukraine rattles financial markets, sending markets sharply lower and causing Standard & Poor's 500-stock index to post its biggest loss since April.
lead_paragraph: The S.&P. 500 posts its biggest loss since April after a plane crashes near the Ukraine-Russia border.

headline.main: Shot-Down Plane Over Ukraine Unsettles Indexes
headline.print_headline: Shot-Down Plane Over Ukraine Unsettles Indexes
